    The dark eyes of the Predacon Senate looked at the figure on the podium 
speaking. It was Senator Hell Beast, the famos Beast Wars vetren, awarded 
many times for bravery, heroics, and genius. Now he spoke of what to do about 
several problems caused by the war.
    "Friends, and fellow Predacons. We find ourselfs at a troubled time in 
the Empire. Our borders are shrinking with Maximal attacks, and our treasury 
grows smaller. I was sent to mine Energon, and I have. But, I find it has 
already depleated. If we are to control Cybertron, and defeat the Maximals, 
we have to stop the war on Earth. First I suggest we stop letting anybot with 
a starship go into the past. And seconed I say we kill anyone who attempts 
it. Examples must be made." Hell Beast said with his vast diplomatic 
expertise.
    "That is very good, Hell Beast, but what do you plan on doing about it? 
Going to the planet to stop the war yourself?" One member said who didnt like 
Hell Beast at all.
    "That would be diff-" He was cut off by another member, now standing and 
waving his arms, "Hell Beast should go! They respect him! And if he were to 
eliminate Megatron while he was there, that would send waves of moral through 
out the empire! We would be great once more!" 
    "Now lets not get out of hand-" Hell Beast was cut off agian because all 
the members agreed. Hell Beast should go back to Earth to kill Megatron and 
stop the war.
    "You leave tommorow morning Hell Beast. You may take major Gremlin with 
you, as back up. I think you should get packing."
